consign.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to send something somewhere, especially in order to sell it
consign.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to send or deliver goods to someone, usually someone who has bought them
consign.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Another copy of the document is sent to the party to whom the goods are consigned.
consign.translation[1].definitions[1].de: if you consign a work of art to an AUCTIONEER, you ask them to sell it
consign.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: He has consigned a Rembrandt to Sothebyâ€™s.
